They play in the Southeast Division of the Eastern Conference of the National Basketball Association( NBA) and are currently coached by Stan Van Gundy . The franchise was founded in 1989 as an expansion franchise and has had such notable NBA stars as Shaquille O'Neal , Anfernee "Penny Hardaway, Grant Hill , and Tracy McGrady throughout its young history. The franchise has also been in the playoffs for more than half of their existence( 10 playoff appearances in 19 years). Currently, the Orlando Magic
